aof3.original_name: Art of Fighting 3 : The Path of the Warrior
aof3.name: 格鬥藝術3:戰士之路
aof3.original_desc:
In this third and final entry in the Art of Fighting series, the story shifts from Ryo Sakazaki to his best friend and rival, Robert Garcia, as he ventures into Mexico to try and locate Freia Lawrence, a childhood friend, who asked for his help. However, he leaves without the consent of The Garcia Foundation, which sends an agent named Karman Cole to get him back. But not everything is as simple as it looks... because Robert is not the only one looking for Freia.

Art of Fighting 3: The Path of The Warrior features ten playable characters with different fighting styles, a completely new fighting system based on joystick and button combinations, and incredibly detailed graphics and animation.
aof3.desc:
在《格鬥藝術》系列的第三部也是最後一部中，故事從坂崎亮轉移到他最好的朋友兼競爭對手羅伯特·加西亞，他冒險進入墨西哥，試圖找到尋求他幫助的兒時朋友弗雷亞·勞倫斯。然而，他未經加西亞基金會同意就離開了，加西亞基金會派了一位名叫卡曼·科爾的特工去把他找回來。但並非一切都像看上去那麼簡單……因為羅伯特並不是唯一一個尋找弗雷亞的人。

《格鬥藝術 3：戰士之路》擁有 10 個具有不同格鬥風格的可玩角色，基於操縱桿和按鈕組合的全新格鬥系統，以及令人難以置信的詳細圖形和動畫。

overtop.name: 過頂
overtop.original_desc: In 1991, ADK (then Alpha team) released Thrash Rally for the Neo Geo. While fun to play, it was most noted for its woefully bad graphics. Five years later, ADK released another "look-out-for-the-next-turn!" game called Overtop. This time they got it almost all right: Great graphics, good sounds, lots of vehicles, and kept the excellent playability of its predecessor.
overtop.desc: 1991 年，ADK（當時的 Alpha 團隊）為 Neo Geo 發布了 Thrash Rally。雖然玩起來很有趣，但它最出名的是其糟糕的圖形。五年後，ADK 發布了另一篇《注意下一個回合！》遊戲名為《Overtop》。這次他們幾乎一切順利：出色的圖形、良好的聲音、大量的車輛，並保持了前作的出色可玩性。

zupapa.name: 爸爸！
zupapa.original_desc: Is a 2001 release of SNK for MVS. It's pretty much a puzzler / screen-cleaning game with bright and colourful optics and simple gameplay.
zupapa.desc: 是 SNK 2001 年發布的 MVS 版。這幾乎是一款益智/屏幕清理遊戲，具有明亮多彩的光學效果和簡單的遊戲玩法。

fatfury3.original_name: Fatal Fury 3: Road to the Final Victory
fatfury3.name: 餓狼傳說3：最終勝利之路
fatfury3.original_desc: An adaptation of the Neo-Geo fighting game.  2-D scrolling one-on-one fighter with pseudo-3D aspects (that allows for players to "escape" holds, throws, and other attacks.)  Part of the incestuously-popular SNK fighting game pantheon...
fatfury3.desc: Neo-Geo 格鬥遊戲的改編版。具有偽 3D 方面的 2D 滾動一對一格鬥遊戲（允許玩家“逃脫”抓握、投擲和其他攻擊。）是廣受歡迎的 SNK 格鬥遊戲萬神殿的一部分......

garou.name: 狼人：狼之印記
garou.original_desc:
It's been several years since Geese Howard was defeated in a battle with Terry Bogard, a young man looking to avenge his father. Rather than looking to be saved from death after falling off his office balcony, Geese instead decided to die, and left behind his young son, Rock. Terry took Rock in and became like a big brother to him, raising the boy throughout his life.

Now Rock is a teenager, and Terry is a man in his 30s, and both are about to come together in a new clash...new faces and old come together for the greatest battle yet!
garou.desc:
吉斯·霍華德 (Geese Howard) 在與特里·博加德 (Terry Bogard) 的一場戰鬥中被擊敗已經過去了幾年，特里·博加德是一位想要為父親報仇的年輕人。從辦公室陽台上摔下來後，吉斯並沒有尋求拯救，而是決定去死，並留下了他年幼的兒子洛克。特里收養了洛克，並把他當作一個大哥哥，撫養這個男孩一生。

現在，洛克已是青少年，特里已是 30 多歲的男人，兩人即將在一場新的衝突中齊聚……新面孔和老面孔齊聚一堂，進行迄今為止最偉大的戰鬥！

shocktro.name: 突擊隊
shocktro.original_desc:
Shock Troopers is a 1-2 player game where players select one of eight characters to play as. Each character has their own attack. Players also have to choose one of three routes to take. The object of the game is to go toward the end of the level and defeat the end-of-level boss, which is usually a huge vehicle. Crates that are scattered throughout the levels can be broken into to reveal new weapons and power-ups.

There is a team mode where players have to select three characters. The characters can be switched on-the-fly during gameplay, which is useful if one of them is badly injured. Players can use the other teammates until life-ups can be found.
shocktro.desc:
Shock Troopers 是一款 1-2 人遊戲，玩家可以從八個角色中選擇一個進行遊戲。每個角色都有自己的攻擊方式。玩家還必須選擇三條路線之一。遊戲的目標是走向關卡的盡頭並擊敗關卡結束的頭目，它通常是一輛巨大的車輛。散佈在各個關卡中的板條箱可以被打破，以揭示新的武器和能力提升。

有一個團隊模式，玩家必須選擇三個角色。角色可以在遊戲過程中即時切換，如果其中一個角色受了重傷，這會很有用。玩家可以使用其他隊友，直到找到生命補充品。

sengoku2.name: 戰國2
sengoku2.original_desc:
A sequel to Sengoku, Sengoku 2 once again casts you as two street fighting heroes caught in the midst of a supernatural attack by the undead forces of the evil Nobunaga from the Japanese sengoku period, although this time the game warps you through several time periods and locations to fight evil, from feudal Japan to WWII Europe.

As in the original, the game plays as a standard 2D side-scrolling beat 'em up, in which you have to proceed through each stage killing all enemies that cross your path and defeating the stage boss to proceed. New for the sequel is the inclusion of swords as your default weapons, which now feature both high and low attacks, as well as a block move that allows you to parry enemy attacks. Collecting orbs gives you weapon upgrades and energy attacks, as well as the ability to morph into any of the three spirits released in the original which give you a new arsenal of moves and powers.
sengoku2.desc:
作為《戰國》的續作，《戰國 2》再次讓你扮演兩名街頭格鬥英雄，陷入日本戰國時期邪惡信長不死勢力的超自然攻擊之中，不過這一次遊戲將帶你穿越多個時間段和地點，從封建日本到二戰歐洲，與邪惡作鬥爭。

與原版一樣，遊戲是標準的 2D 橫向捲軸清版遊戲，您必須完成每個階段，殺死所有遇到的敵人並擊敗階段老闆才能繼續。續作的新功能是將劍作為默認武器，現在具有高攻擊力和低攻擊力，以及可讓您招架敵人攻擊的格擋移動。收集球體可以讓你進行武器升級和能量攻擊，還可以變身為原作中釋放的三種靈魂中的任何一種，從而為你提供新的動作和力量。

nitd.name: 解除好友2：暗网
nitd.original_desc:
This was an ancient story when people still believed in witchcraft.

There lived one gravedigger at a very small village in a remote region. He lived a quiet, solitary life in a corner of the cemetery. He kept away from the village people due to his very ugly appearance. One day, he found the graves were ransacked and some corpses were stolen. He didn't want the village people to find out, so he decided to eliminate the grave burglars by himself. Thus, he patrolled the cemetery every night.

There are five stages with five levels each, and each one of them has you throwing fireballs at ghouls, ghosts, goblins, and zombies. When you keep throwing fireballs at these enemies, they will ignite into a giant fireball, which you can throw at other enemies to kill them, and get the remaining treasure before moving on to the next level. At the end of the fifth level, a boss must be defeated in order to continue the game.
nitd.desc:
這是一個古老的故事，當時人們還相信巫術。

在一個偏遠地區的一個小村莊里住著一位掘墓人。他在墓地的一角過著安靜、孤獨的生活。由於相貌醜陋，他遠離村里人。有一天，他發現墳墓被洗劫一空，一些屍體被盜。他不想讓村里的人知道，所以他決定親自消滅盜墓賊。於是，他每天晚上都在墓地巡邏。

有五個階段，每個階段有五個級別，每個階段都需要你向食屍鬼、幽靈、妖精和殭屍投擲火球。當你不斷向這些敵人扔火球時，它們會點燃成一個巨大的火球，你可以將火球扔向其他敵人殺死他們，並獲得剩餘的寶藏，然後進入下一關。在第五關結束時，必須擊敗 Boss 才能繼續遊戲。

samsho5.name: 侍魂 V
samsho5.original_desc:
Seven years after the fourth game in the series, Samurai Shodown returns. In the game's time frame, this is the earliest game, hence the Japanese title Samurai Spirits Zero. It takes place in 1786 from January through the later summer. The game is therefore considered a prequel to the series.

The overall gameplay was slightly altered. It is a little faster, and the Slash/Bust system has been removed. Each character now has only one version, or the Bust mode is simply replaced by a new character of very similar setup. Combo slashes, sidestepping and fatalities have also vanished. The basic moves have been modeled after the first games in the series. They consist of three types of slashes, a single kick, and various dodge maneuvers similar to Samurai Shodown II.

There are 24 characters, a familiar cast with some new faces. Unlike the previous games, it is not possible to kill your opponent.
samsho5.desc:
該系列第四款遊戲七年後，《侍魂曉》回歸。在遊戲的時間範圍內，這是最早的遊戲，因此日文標題為“Samurai Spirits Zero”。它發生在 1786 年，從一月到夏末。因此，該遊戲被認為是該系列的前傳。

整體遊戲玩法略有改變。它有點快，並且削減/破壞系統已被刪除。每個角色現在只有一個版本，或者半身像模式只是被一個設置非常相似的新角色所取代。連擊、閃避和死亡也消失了。基本動作是根據該系列的第一場比賽建模的。它們由三種類型的斬擊、單踢和類似於《侍魂 II》的各種閃避動作組成。

共有 24 個角色，既有熟悉的演員陣容，也有一些新面孔。與之前的遊戲不同，你不可能殺死你的對手。

pnyaa.name: 波奇與妮雅
pnyaa.original_desc: A nice puzzle game that is pretty similar to Super Puzzle Fighter but doesnt reach the same quality level!
pnyaa.desc: 一款不錯的益智遊戲，與 Super Puzzle Fighter 非常相似，但沒有達到相同的質量水平！

eightman.name: 八人
eightman.original_desc: The super-hero must stop the destruction of a city at the hands of a giant robot and its maker. The object, as Eightman (or Nineman), is to move left or right punching enemies and fight a boss at the end of the level. In some levels, you are chasing after a vehicle while enemies jump out at you. Power-ups can be collected along the way, which, when collected will make your kicks and punches stronger as well as give you bombs which are used to damage all enemies. If a two-player game is in progress, a spark will be between them and their bomb power will be increased.
eightman.desc: 超級英雄必須阻止巨型機器人及其製造者對城市的破壞。作為八人（或九人），目標是向左或向右移動拳打敵人並在關卡結束時與老闆戰鬥。在某些關卡中，你正在追趕車輛，而敵人卻向你撲來。一路上可以收集能量道具，收集後會讓你的拳打腳踢變得更強，並為你提供炸彈，用於傷害所有敵人。如果進行兩人遊戲，兩人之間會產生火花，炸彈威力也會增加。

strhoop.name: 街頭希望
strhoop.original_desc: Which team is the best at 3-on-3? Choose from ten countries to find out. Shots vary according to the shooting distance. Fake dunk, aloof - a variety of techniques to choose from! Speedy! Powerful! Move your body to hip hoppin' rap music. When the power gauge reaches its max, Super Dunk sparks!
strhoop.desc: 哪支球隊最擅長3對3？從十個國家中選擇一個來找出答案。根據拍攝距離的不同，拍攝效果也會有所不同。假扣籃、超然——多種技法可供選擇！迅速！強大的！隨著嘻哈說唱音樂移動你的身體。當能量表達到最大值時，Super Dunk 就會火花四射！

doubledr.name: 雙龍
doubledr.original_desc: Released around the same time as the film of the same name and loosely based on its story, this installment in the Double Dragon series also moves away from the traditional roam-the-streets-fighting to a pure one-on-one fighter. There are ten characters to choose from, including Billy and Jimmy and the game has colorful interactive backgrounds, screen zooming, over-the-top special moves and with the inclusion of double jumps, combos, charges for the losing player and counter hits, there is plenty of room for advanced fighting strategies.
doubledr.desc: 《雙截龍》系列的這部作品與同名電影大約在同一時間上映，並大致根據其故事改編，也從傳統的街頭格斗轉向純粹的一對一格鬥。有十個角色可供選擇，包括比利和吉米，遊戲擁有豐富多彩的互動背景、屏幕縮放、誇張的特殊動作，還包括二段跳、連擊、對失敗者的衝鋒和反擊，為高級戰鬥策略提供了足夠的空間。

stakwin2.name: 賭注獲勝者 2
stakwin2.original_desc: Stakes Winner 2 is a sports game in which you get in the saddle to compete in horse races in Europe and the United States. Accelerating and sprinting at the right time while managing the horse's fatigue are the keys to a good performance. If you win, use your winnings to buy accessories and become even better at it. The handling is a bit smoother than in the first episode. The realisation is also a bit better, although the game is still very close to the first one.
stakwin2.desc: Stakes Winner 2 是一款體育遊戲，您將在其中參加歐洲和美國的賽馬比賽。在正確的時間加速和衝刺，同時控制馬匹的疲勞是獲得良好表現的關鍵。如果你贏了，可以用你的獎金購買配件並變得更好。處理比第一集中流暢一些。儘管遊戲仍然非常接近第一款，但實現也更好一些。

pulstar.name: 普爾斯塔
pulstar.original_desc:
An alien threat looms over the galaxy and only you and your trusty star fighter can defeat them.

Pulstar is a 2D side-scrolling shooter in which you control your ship as it makes its way past stages filled with waves after waves of enemies bent on your destruction. You can upgrade your main weapons by collecting power-ups and charging up energy allows you to release charged attacks at the cost of power-up consumption. Additionally your ship comes with an ever-prescent "option" gun pod that floats around your ship and which can be positioned in several configurations to help protect the ship or increase its firepower.

While completely 2D, the game uses pre-rendered 3D sprites and includes fully animated cutscenes between each level. Also features support for two-player gameplay.
pulstar.desc:
銀河系上空籠罩著外星威脅，只有你和你值得信賴的星際戰士才能擊敗他們。

Pulstar 是一款 2D 橫向捲軸射擊遊戲，您可以在遊戲中控制您的飛船，讓它通過充滿一波又一波一波又一波一波又一波想要摧毀您的敵人的關卡。你可以通過收集能量來升級你的主要武器，並充能能量讓你以能量消耗為代價釋放蓄力攻擊。此外，你的飛船還配備了一個隨時存在的“選項”炮艙，它漂浮在你的飛船周圍，可以以多種配置定位，以幫助保護飛船或增強其火力。

雖然完全是 2D 遊戲，但遊戲使用預渲染的 3D 精靈，並在每個關卡之間包含完全動畫的過場動畫。還支持兩人遊戲。

neobombe.name: 新炸彈人
neobombe.original_desc: As Bomberman, you must kill all the enemies in the level before proceeding to the next. To do this, you clear a path of blocks by setting bombs that will detonate a few seconds later, and then use the bombs to wipe out enemies. Some blocks will uncover power-ups, and depending on which ones you collect, you will receive more bombs, more lives, more time, manual bomb detonation, expanded blast zone, and the ability to move faster. In some levels some blocks will reveal eggs that you can hatch to produce a bird that you can ride on and allows you to take an additional hit from an enemy or bomb blast without losing a life.
neobombe.desc: 作為炸彈人，您必須殺死該關卡中的所有敵人，然後才能進入下一關卡。為此，您可以通過設置幾秒鐘後爆炸的炸彈來清除一條路徑上的方塊，然後使用炸彈消滅敵人。有些方塊會發現能量提升，根據你收集的能量提升，你將收到更多的炸彈、更多的生命、更多的時間、手動炸彈爆炸、擴大的爆炸區域以及更快移動的能力。在某些關卡中，某些方塊會顯示雞蛋，您可以孵化這些雞蛋，生成一隻可以騎在身上的鳥，並允許您承受敵人或炸彈爆炸的額外打擊而不會失去生命。

bstars.name: 職業棒球明星
bstars.original_desc: Baseball Stars Professional is the follow-up to Baseball Stars for the Nintendo Entertainment System, and features comic-style graphics. Choose from a variety of teams that include Celestial Planets, Heavenly Bodies, Shadow Demons, Battle Knights, Fabulous Superstars, and many others. Then select the field where the game is to be held: The SNK stadium or the SNK dome. Each field has the same dimensions, but their capacity varies. The game is played the same way as normal baseball. Features a VS. mode in which two players can play against each other.
bstars.desc: 《棒球明星職業版》是任天堂娛樂系統《棒球明星》的後續作品，具有漫畫風格的圖形。從各種團隊中進行選擇，包括天體行星、天體、暗影惡魔、戰鬥騎士、神話般的超級巨星等等。然後選擇要舉行比賽的場地：SNK 體育場或 SNK 巨蛋。每個字段具有相同的尺寸，但其容量不同。比賽的方式與普通棒球相同。具有 VS。兩名玩家可以互相對戰的模式。

ghostlop.name: 格甚洛普
ghostlop.original_desc: Ghost Lop is an excellent Ghostbusters themed puzzle game by Data East from 1996. It combines the fast action of an Arkanoid style game, with the quick thinking of a Bust-A-Move type game. The game was re-considered for release in 2001, but SNK's untimely demise later that same year may have ended that possibility. Data East was best known for its' Chain Reaction / Magical Drop series of puzzle games, and even later included the Ghostlop characters in one of the later releases for modern home game systems.
ghostlop.desc: Ghost Lop是Data East於1996年推出的一款優秀的捉鬼敢死隊主題益智遊戲。它結合了打磚塊風格遊戲的快速動作和Bust-A-Move類型遊戲的快速思維。2001 年，該遊戲被重新考慮發行，但同年晚些時候 SNK 的過早消亡可能結束了這種可能性。Data East 以其“連鎖反應/魔法掉落”系列益智遊戲而聞名，甚至後來在現代家庭遊戲系統的後續版本之一中包含了 Ghostlop 角色。

superspy.name: 超級間諜
superspy.original_desc:
Roy Heart has been asked by the CIA to wipe out terrorists who have taken over a large skyscraper of a major auto-maker in Japan. 
Using your fists, knife, or gun, you must use the elevators to travel between floors and wipe out terrorists that try to bring you down. Each weapon has its disadvantages. The gun, for example, will only have so many bullets per life, and the knife will decrease in strength with every use. During your mission, you will also earn experience points, and meet and free hostages along the way. These hostages will heal you, fix your knife, and give you a machine gun. Some floors end with you defeating a boss, while others end at elevators. Your must reach the top of the building where you will confront the leader.
superspy.desc:
中央情報局要求羅伊·哈特消滅佔領日本一家大型汽車製造商一座大型摩天大樓的恐怖分子。
你必須使用你的拳頭、刀或槍，使用電梯在樓層之間移動，並消滅試圖將你打倒的恐怖分子。每種武器都有其缺點。例如，槍每次只能發射一定數量的子彈，而刀的強度會隨著每次使用而減弱。在執行任務期間，您還將獲得經驗值，並沿途會見並解救人質。這些人質會治愈你，修好你的刀，並給你一把機槍。有些樓層以擊敗老闆結束，而另一些樓層則以電梯結束。你必須到達建築物的頂部，在那裡你將面對領導者。

karnovr.name: 卡諾夫的複仇
karnovr.original_desc: Karnov's Revenge is a 2-D Street Fighter II clone from Data East. Choose one of 13 fighters from around the world to play as, each with their unique moves and special attacks. As usual, there are two rounds in each stage, and the object of each round is to drain your opponent's energy in order to win the battle. If there is a tie after two rounds, a third round is played. There is a time limit, and if this expires, the player with the less energy loses.
karnovr.desc: 《卡諾夫的複仇》是 Data East 的 2D 街頭霸王 II 克隆版。從世界各地的 13 名戰士中選擇一名進行遊戲，每位戰士都有獨特的動作和特殊攻擊。和往常一樣，每個階段有兩輪，每一輪的目標都是耗盡對手的能量以贏得戰鬥。如果兩輪後平局，則進行第三輪。有時間限制，如果超過了時間，能量較少的玩家就會失敗。

mslug3.name: 合金彈頭3
mslug3.original_desc:
In the third installment of the Metal Slug series, General Morden is back and he plans to establish a new world order. You guide one of the heroes: Marco, Tarma, Eri or Fio as they blast their way through sidescrolling levels with a unique theme, filled with countless enemies and difficult bosses. You have to free hostages and you can ride bizarre vehicles such as camels, elephants, tanks and robots.

In the Xbox version, additional game modes, such as Storming the Mothership and Chubby Isle Paradiso, can be unlocked upon completing the five arcade stages. A co-op mode has been included, but no online multiplayer. The only Xbox Live feature available allows you to compare singleplayer scores.
mslug3.desc:
在《合金彈頭》系列的第三部中，莫登將軍回來了，他計劃建立一個新的世界秩序。你將引導其中一位英雄：Marco、Tarma、Eri 或 Fio，讓他們在具有獨特主題的橫向捲軸關卡中殺出一條血路，其中充滿了無數的敵人和棘手的頭目。你必須解救人質，你可以乘坐駱駝、大象、坦克和機器人等奇異的車輛。

在 Xbox 版本中，完成五個街機階段後即可解鎖額外的遊戲模式，例如風暴母艦和胖乎乎的天堂島。包含了合作模式，但沒有在線多人遊戲。唯一可用的 Xbox Live 功能允許您比較單人遊戲分數。

ssideki4.name: 終極11：SNK足球錦標賽
ssideki4.original_desc: Super Sidekicks 4, also known as The Ultimate 11: SNK Football Championship, is a sports retro arcade football (soccer) game created for the Neo Geo arcade system, and is the fourth of the popular Super Sidekicks series. The game features 80 national teams divided into 8 regions of the globe. Build power the more you hold the ball. Maintain your dribble and guard off against enemy steals. Amass enough foot power and kick the ball to the goal!
ssideki4.desc: 《Super Sidekicks 4》又名《終極11：SNK足球錦標賽》，是一款專為Neo Geo街機系統打造的運動復古街機足球（足球）遊戲，是熱門Super Sidekicks系列的第四部。該比賽有分佈在全球 8 個地區的 80 支國家隊參加。持球越多，力量就越強。保持運球並防止敵人搶斷。積累足夠的腳力，將球踢向球門！

zedblade.name: 劫刃
zedblade.original_desc: You and/or a friend must choose one of three characters to play as, each with different speeds at which they control their ships. Then select three weapons to use for the front and back of your ship. During play, you must travel to every planet in the solar system, and defeat the various enemy ships and the boss near the end of the planet. Your weapons can be upgraded during the battle, and you can also collect HyperBombs if you want to do maximum damage. Contains a nice soundtrack reminiscent of early 1990s "rave" music.
zedblade.desc: 您和/或朋友必須選擇三個角色之一來玩，每個角色控制船隻的速度都不同。然後選擇三種武器用於你的船的前部和後部。在遊戲過程中，你必須前往太陽系的每一個星球，並擊敗各種敵方船隻和星球盡頭附近的boss。你的武器可以在戰鬥中升級，如果你想造成最大傷害，還可以收集超級炸彈。包含令人想起 20 世紀 90 年代早期“狂歡”音樂的美妙配樂。

ncommand.name: 忍者突擊隊
ncommand.original_desc:
The Mars Corporation has caused a problem in the time continuum, and it's up to the Ninja Commandos to go after Spider, leader of the MC, and stop his evil work.

As one of three Ninja Commandos, you must fight your opponents through different time periods, such as The Primitive Age, The Egyptian Era, and the Japanese Civil War Era. Each of the Ninja Commandos have their own specific style of attack and a special "ninja trick" super power. Boxes and other storage units can be broken to reveal power-ups that upgrade your weapons. The bosses are super-powered historical figures and include a dinosaur, a medieval samurai, an Egyptian pharaoh, etc. Cut-scenes occur between the different time periods.
ncommand.desc:
火星公司在時間連續體中造成了問題，忍者突擊隊有責任追捕 MC 領袖蜘蛛，並阻止他的邪惡行為。

作為三名忍者突擊隊之一，你必須與不同時期的對手戰鬥，例如原始時代、埃及時代和日本內戰時代。每個忍者突擊隊都有自己特定的攻擊風格和特殊的“忍者技巧”超能力。盒子和其他存儲單元可以被打破，以顯示升級你的武器的能力。Boss都是超能力的歷史人物，包括恐龍、中世紀武士、埃及法老等。過場動畫發生在不同的時間段之間。

viewpoin.name: 觀點
viewpoin.original_desc:
Viewpoint is a top-down orthographic perspective game in the tradition of Zaxxon. The PlayStation and Saturn versions feature 3D rendered graphics with texture maps, unlike the other versions which primarily feature shaded polygons.

One or two players (in hot-seat or cooperative mode) control a spaceship equipped with a laser cannon which can be charged (by holding the shooting button down) for a stronger blast. Besides the main weapon, three special weapons are available: a wall of fire which wipes the screen up in a wave, a nova-like blast and a circle of spherical-green homing missiles.
viewpoin.desc:
Viewpoint 是一款繼承了 Zaxxon 傳統的自上而下的正交透視遊戲。PlayStation 和 Saturn 版本採用帶有紋理貼圖的 3D 渲染圖形，與主要採用陰影多邊形的其他版本不同。

一到兩名玩家（在熱座或合作模式下）控制一艘配備激光炮的宇宙飛船，激光炮可以充電（按住射擊按鈕）以獲得更強的爆炸力。除了主要武器外，還可以使用三種特殊武器：一波波地擦過屏幕的火牆、新星般的爆炸和一圈球形綠色尋的導彈。

bjourney.name: 藍色的旅程
bjourney.original_desc:
The planet of Raguy was once beautiful and peaceful, but all hell broke loose when it was invaded by the Daruma tribe. The pollution started to spread through the city. Blue was summoned to get rid of the Daruma tribe, and save Raguy from the Daruma Empire that has turned the inhabitants into slaves.

You control Blue, who only has one weapon to deal with the Darumas. You can use his leaf to whip enemies upside-down, and hurl these enemies at others. Along the way, you can get flowers for use at the shop to buy items that will help you along the way. These items include flower honey (increases stamina), swim fins (easier swimming), light safe (protects all your items), spikes, and ocarinas. Later in the game, you can also get the shopkeeper to sing you a song. This helps you break curses that are placed on you by a witch.You will also interact with other characters along the way that can also help you if you tell the truth.

You exit each stage by jumping on a huge plant. The higher up you are on this plant, the more points you are awarded. Every two or so stages, you have to defeat a boss before a guy in a devil suit offers you something. You can refuse or accept the other. If you accept the offer, you will have to pull one of four strings that will give you a life ball, more stamina, 30 flowers, cocoons, or five flowers.

You are on a time limit. If you run out of time, a black creature appears out of nowhere, and starts firing "bird" missiles at you.
bjourney.desc:
拉吉星球曾經美麗而和平，但當達摩部落入侵時，一切都陷入了混亂。污染開始向整個城市蔓延。布魯被召喚來消滅達摩部落，並從將居民變成奴隸的達摩帝國手中拯救拉吉。

你控制藍色，他只有一件武器來對付達摩。你可以用他的葉子將敵人鞭打顛倒，並將這些敵人扔向其他人。一路上，您可以在商店購買鮮花來購買對您一路有幫助的物品。這些物品包括花蜜（增加耐力）、腳蹼（更容易游泳）、燈箱（保護您的所有物品）、尖刺和陶笛。遊戲後期，你還可以讓店主給你唱首歌。這可以幫助你打破女巫對你施加的詛咒。一路上你還將與其他角色互動，如果你說實話，這些角色也可以幫助你。

你通過跳上一棵巨大的植物來退出每個階段。您在該工廠的地位越高，獲得的積分就越多。每隔兩個左右的階段，你必須先擊敗一個老闆，然後一個穿著魔鬼套裝的傢伙會給你一些東西。你可以拒絕也可以接受對方。如果你接受這個提議，你必須拉動四根繩子中的一根，這會給你一個生命球、更多的耐力、30朵花、繭或五朵花。

你有時間限制。如果你沒時間了，一個黑色生物會突然出現，並開始向你發射“鳥”導彈。

magdrop2.name: 魔法掉落II
magdrop2.original_desc:
In Magical Drop II, you control a clown that can grab and throw balloons. You have to match three balloons of the same colour or more vertically to pop them and clear the screen. You can hold multiple balloons of the same colour at once and cause consecutive collisions. There are special balloons that cannot be removed that easily and power-ups that clear entire rows or provide additional help.

Depending of the originating country, there are different game modes:

1. Survival: Play as long as you can - an endless flow of balloons appears at a rapidly increasing speed while you move up levels.

2. Puzzle: You have a limited time to clear a fixed set of balloons before time runs out.

3. VS Mode: Fight the CPU or a fellow player in a direct split-screen duel. Each character has specific item balloons during gameplay.
magdrop2.desc:
在 Magical Drop II 中，您控制一個可以抓住和投擲氣球的小丑。您必須匹配三個相同顏色或更多垂直方向的氣球才能彈出它們並清除屏幕。您可以同時握住多個相同顏色的氣球並引起連續碰撞。有些特殊的氣球無法輕易移除，而能量提升可以清除整行或提供額外的幫助。

根據來源國家/地區的不同，有不同的遊戲模式：

1.生存：盡可能長時間地玩——當你升級時，無盡的氣球會以快速增加的速度出現。

2. 謎題：在時間耗盡之前，您必須在有限的時間內清除一組固定的氣球。

3. VS模式：與CPU或其他玩家進行直接分屏對決。每個角色在遊戲過程中都有特定的物品氣球。

mutnat.name: 突變國度
mutnat.original_desc:
The Slum... an area of town completely forgotten. No one could imagine the cruelness suffered by innocent people who were transformed into horrible mutant creatures by genetic experiments. They hovered everywhere and completely took control of the town.

Mutation Nation is a 1-2 player action game where you must control your hero and beat up any mutant that gets in your way, by either using your fists or one of four special attacks. A boss at the end of each area needs to be defeated if you want to proceed further through the game.
mutnat.desc:
貧民窟……城鎮中完全被遺忘的區域。誰都無法想像，無辜的人們被基因實驗變成了可怕的變異生物，所遭受的殘酷。他們四處盤旋，完全控制了小鎮。

Mutation Nation 是一款 1-2 人動作遊戲，您必須控制您的英雄，並通過使用拳頭或四種特殊攻擊之一擊敗任何擋路的變種人。如果你想繼續遊戲，就需要擊敗每個區域盡頭的頭目。

kof2002.name: 拳皇2002
kof2002.original_desc:
The second plotless "dream match" in The King of Fighters series, this game sports 39 normal characters and 5 hidden characters, some of whom haven't appeared since KOF98. The King of Fighters 2002 also has five characters exclusive to the X-Box, the PS2 and/or Dreamcast systems: Shingo Yabuki, King, Geese Howard, "Riot of the Blood" Iori and Leopold Goenitz. Shingo and King are available on all the non-Neo Geo systems, while Geese and the rest are only available on the PS2 and X-Box platforms.

The gameplay system has also changed. The striker system and four-character teams found in the last three KOF releases have been totally removed. In their place are the old-school three man teams and the "Advanced system" from The King of Fighters '97 and The King of Fighters '98.
kof2002.desc:
《拳皇》系列中第二款無劇情的“夢幻對決”，這款遊戲擁有 39 個普通角色和 5 個隱藏角色，其中一些角色自 KOF98 以來就沒有出現過。《拳皇 2002》還擁有 X-Box、PS2 和/或 Dreamcast 系統獨有的五個角色：Shingo Yabuki、King、Geese Howard、“Riot of the Blood”Iori 和 Leopold Goenitz。Shingo 和 King 可在所有非 Neo Geo 系統上使用，而 Geese 和其他系統僅可在 PS2 和 X-Box 平台上使用。

遊戲系統也發生了變化。前三款 KOF 版本中的前鋒系統和四角色隊伍已被完全刪除。取而代之的是老式的三人隊伍以及《拳皇’97》和《拳皇’98》中的“高級系統”。

lbowling.name: 保齡球聯賽
lbowling.original_desc: The lanes are crowded every night with Big Time Pin Slammin' action! You call the shots selecting a right or left handed bowler. Determine ball weight, and develop the skills of the pro's as you skillfully throw a variety of shots that you control. So pop some refreshments and settle into this indoor sport like you've never seen before!
lbowling.desc: 每天晚上，球道上都擠滿了“Big Time Pin Slammin”活動！您可以選擇右手或左手投球手。確定球的重量，並在熟練地投出您控制的各種擊球時培養專業人士的技能。所以，帶上一些茶點，開始這項您以前從未見過的室內運動吧！

crsword.name: 交叉的劍
crsword.original_desc: As a knight, you must travel the countryside fighting monsters and bandits using your sword and shield. When you enter combat the view changes to a pseudo 1st-person perspective where the body of your knight is outlined so that you can see the creatures that you are fighting. When enemies have been defeated, they drop money and power-ups. There are seven chapters in the game, and each chapter (except one) starts with you entering a merchant's shop and buying weapons using the money that you have collected so far. There are also alternate paths which take you to different parts of the game. At the start of the game, you may choose a chapter (from one to three only) you want to start at.
crsword.desc: 作為一名騎士，你必須使用你的劍和盾牌在鄉村中與怪物和強盜作戰。當您進入戰鬥時，視圖會變為偽第一人稱視角，其中騎士的身體被勾勒出輪廓，以便您可以看到正在戰鬥的生物。當敵人被擊敗時，他們會掉落金錢和能量。遊戲共有七個章節，每一章（除一章外）都是從你進入商人的商店並使用你目前收集到的錢購買武器開始的。還有替代路徑可帶您前往遊戲的不同部分。遊戲開始時，您可以選擇要開始的章節（僅限一到三章）。

samsho.name: 侍魂曉
samsho.original_desc:
In early Japan, a man named Shiro Tokisada Amakusa preaches a heretic religion. Little does anyone know that Amakusa is really a servant of the evil Ambrosia, who took over Amakusa's body. Ambrosia wishes to shroud the world in darkness.
Now, choose between 12 warriors (and 3 bonus characters) to fight for the honor of destroying Amakusa, and fulfilling a mission.
samsho.desc:
在早期的日本，有一位名叫天草時定四郎的人宣揚異端宗教。很少有人知道天草實際上是邪惡安布羅西亞的僕人，安布羅西亞佔據了天草的身體。安布羅西亞希望將世界籠罩在黑暗之中。
現在，從 12 名戰士（以及 3 名獎勵角色）中進行選擇，為摧毀天草並完成任務的榮譽而戰。

spinmast.name: 旋轉大師
spinmast.original_desc:
An evil doctor has kidnapped John and Tom's friend, Mary, and has stolen their treasure map. Rescuing Mary and getting back all pieces of the map takes them through 5 levels of arcade-style Jump'n Shoot-action.

There are several weapons to acquire, ranging from a yo-yo (the standard weapon) to bombs, icicles, missiles and more. Weapons differ in range, shooting frequency, and power, and can be shot in all directions. Each weapon also has a unique chargeable attack as well as a super-attack (which uses up one bomb-symbol).

It is also possible to jump on enemies or perform a sliding attack.
spinmast.desc:
一名邪惡的醫生綁架了約翰和湯姆的朋友瑪麗，並偷走了他們的藏寶圖。營救瑪麗並取回地圖上的所有碎片，他們將經歷 5 個街機風格的跳躍射擊動作關卡。

有多種武器可供獲取，從溜溜球（標準武器）到炸彈、冰柱、導彈等等。武器的射程、射擊頻率和威力各不相同，並且可以向各個方向射擊。每種武器還具有獨特的可充電攻擊以及超級攻擊（消耗一個炸彈符號）。

也可以跳向敵人或進行滑動攻擊。

kof97.name: 拳皇'97
kof97.original_desc: Another year, another KOF. Additions this year come in the form of slightly improved graphics and sounds, new moves and a new game mode. Gameplay is much more plot-driven, as you have middle-bosses that can change depending on what team you select. In addition, there are several special endings which are only shown when certain "Edit Team" combinations are selected. New characters include the New Face Team, the Fatal Fury Outlaw Team (featuring the KOF debut of "Blue" Mary Ryan and Ryuji Yamazaki, and the return of Billy Kane), and Kyo's pupil Shingo Yabuki. In total, The King of Fighters '97 sports 29 separate characters.
kof97.desc: 又一年，又一個KOF。今年的新增內容包括稍微改進的圖形和聲音、新動作和新遊戲模式。遊戲玩法更加受情節驅動，因為你的中層老闆可以根據你選擇的團隊而改變。此外，還有一些特殊結局只有在選擇某些“編輯團隊”組合時才會顯示。新角色包括新面孔小隊、餓狼傳說小隊（以“藍色”瑪麗·瑞恩和山崎龍二的 KOF 首秀以及比利·凱恩的回歸為特色）以及京的學生矢吹慎吾。《拳皇 97》總共有 29 個獨立角色。

socbrawl.name: 足球亂鬥
socbrawl.original_desc: The Cybernetic players use special kick shots and built-in arm phasers to destroy other players. Make sure your power meter is FULL when exercising these brutal tactics. Both stadiums, which are magnetically enclosed, enable you to kick or pass... off the wall! There are no fouls in this league, so watch your back or you'll get pulverized by the opposing team! You'll find here the most advanced sport in the world of soccer... SOCCER BRAWL!
socbrawl.desc: 控制論玩家使用特殊的踢球和內置手臂移相器來摧毀其他玩家。在運用這些殘酷的策略時，請確保你的功率計已滿。兩個體育場均採用磁力封閉，可讓您從牆上踢或傳球！這個聯賽沒有犯規，所以小心你的背後，否則你會被對方球隊碾壓！您將在這裡找到足球世界中最先進的運動……足球亂鬥！
